sentences.sContent: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.sContent_eng: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.sCn: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.sContent: We sipped dry sherry on his porch until sunrise, and shortly thereafter he moved in to my small Florida home.
sentences.sContent_eng: We sipped dry sherry on his porch until sunrise, and shortly thereafter he moved in to my small Florida home.
sentences.sCn: 我们在他家的门廊上啜饮着干雪利酒，直到太阳升起。 此后不久，他搬进了我在佛罗里达的小家。

synos.tran: [食品]雪利酒（西班牙产的一种烈性白葡萄酒）；葡萄酒

trans.tranCn: 雪利酒（西班牙产的一种烈性白葡萄酒）；葡萄酒
trans.tranOther: a pale or dark brown strong wine, originally from Spain
